product_overview: A scalable, modern single-page e-commerce platform built with React and TypeScript that offers seamless shopping, payment, and user profile management experience.
core_goals: Enable users to browse and explore products with detailed information and reviews.
Provide a smooth and secure checkout process with Razorpay payment integration.
Offer comprehensive order management including order tracking and invoicing.
Allow users to manage their profiles, addresses, and security settings.
Deliver dynamic homepage content managed via PocketBase for easy updates.
Ensure responsive and intuitive navigation throughout the site.
key_features: Product listing with detailed product pages including reviews.
Shopping cart management with real-time updates.
Checkout flow integrated with Razorpay for order creation and payment verification.
User profile management with sections for personal info, address book, order history, and security settings.
Order management system supporting order list, detail views, invoice generation, and tracking.
Dynamic homepage configuration controlled through PocketBase and cached for performance.
SPA routing with React Router and responsive navigation menu.
Analytics integration for usage tracking and insights.
Local Express server setup to proxy API calls such as Razorpay endpoints.
Reusable UI components including carousel, calendar, toast notifications, and image optimization utilities.
user_flow_summary: User visits homepage and browses products through the product listing page.
User selects a product to view detailed information and reviews.
User adds desired products to the shopping cart and manages quantities.
User proceeds to checkout, where Razorpay processes payment with order creation and verification.
Upon successful payment, user receives order confirmation and can view order details.
Users can access their profile to update personal info, manage addresses, review past orders, and update security settings.
Users can track their orders via the order tracking interface.
Admins or content managers update homepage content dynamically via PocketBase management interface.
validation_criteria: All product details and reviews display correctly and update dynamically.
Checkout flow correctly creates orders and verifies payments through Razorpay endpoints.
Shopping cart maintains accurate contents during user session.
User profile changes persist and are immediately visible.
Order lists and detail views load without errors and show accurate information.
Homepage content updates reflect without downtime or caching issues.
Navigation routes respond instantly without page reloads.
Analytics data is accurately captured and available for review.
All local server endpoints, including Razorpay proxy, respond correctly during development testing.
UI components render consistently across supported browsers and devices.
